name: max_light()
calculateAngle()
Default Starting Parameters Trigger
info:
Sends degault values and triggers starting of sending angles to the medibox.
This trigger activates when the light data is ready.

name: Update Sliders()
defMedConfig()
func:
return msg;

/*This function (On start tab) contains the default values 
for the parameters "controlFactor" and "minAngle" for three medicine presets.
It sets them as flow variables on start.
This is required for updating the UI when ever a preset medicine isselected in the
drop down, but user changes a slider to a non preset configuration.
(Otherwise their will be infinity loop of updating
the sliders and the dropdown.)*/

name: resetDropdowmToCustom()
